status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"aujkg","text":"Design of single stranded oligo library:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7eo97","text":"5'-AGGACCGGATCAACT**CRE_270bp**CATTGCGTGAACCGA-3'","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b7rt3","text":"To transform the single stranded oligos into double stranded DNA, set up the following PCR reaction:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ad03","text":"2 µL single stranded oligos ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"49ckm","text":"5 µL primer pool_amp_F (10µM stock)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f342r","text":"5 µL primer pool_amp_R (10µM stock)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"is3n","text":"50 µL NEBNext Ultra II Q5 Master Mix","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1kq26","text":"38 µL nuclease free water","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6fp9s","text":"Split the reaction mix into 4 PCR tubes to avoid PCR jackpotting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6tprs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d4tht","text":"Incubate in a PCR cycler with heated lid:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aqv9a","text":"30s - 98°C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ultr","text":"8 cycles (10s - 98°C; 20s - 60°C; 30s - 72°C)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f8a75","text":"5min - 72°C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fircr","text":"hold - 4°C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ahit","text":"Combine the reaction mix from the 4 PCR tubes in a DNA low binding 1.5 tube. Clean up the PCR product with 1.8X vol. of AMPure XP magnetic beads following the manufacturer's protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a5im9","text":"Elute the PCR product in 21 µL nuclease free water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"17ep5","text":"Determine the DNA concentration by measuring 1 µL on the Nanodrop.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1anol","text":"Gibson overhangs and a 12bp barcode are added by PCR.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ahsg3","text":"Set up the following PCR reaction:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5on2c","text":"variable: 25 ng PCR product from step   ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ft5tc","text":"5 µL primer CRS_pMPRA1-GibOH_F (10µM stock)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1cqqu","text":"5 µL primer CRS_GibOH_uniRV_BC12_R (10µM stock)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6g4d","text":"50 µL NEBNext Ultra II Q5 Master Mix","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ekd7r","text":"to 100 µL: nuclease free water","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"hsq0","text":"Split the reaction mix into 4 PCR tubes to avoid PCR jackpotting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eov92","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"A87E5BB0FC3D11EBA4D55F21EF5915FB","id":0,"step_guid":"6722FD10FC3311EBA4D55F21EF5915FB","title":""}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"29q87","text":"Incubate in a PCR cycler with heated lid:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3hpbd","text":"30s - 98°C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5rjq6","text":"14 cycles (10s - 98°C; 20s - 60°C; 30s - 72°C)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dl767","text":"5min - 72°C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fmqkq","text":"hold - 4°C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8knq2","text":"Combine the reaction mix from the 4 PCR tubes and add 20 µL 6X gel loading dye. Perform DNA gel electrophoresis (30 min, 100 V) on a gel made of 1 % agarose in 1X TAE, with 1:30'000 SYBR Safe stain. Cut the band(s) at 399 bp using a blue light illuminator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1874s","text":"Extract DNA from the agarose by using the Zymoclean Gel DNA Recovery Kit and following the manufacturer's protocol. Elute in 20 µL nuclease free water. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d5kao","text":"Repurify the product using the DNA Clean \u0026 Concentrator Kit (binding buffer ratio 5:1) and following the manufacturer's protocol. Elute in 12 µL nuclease free water. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1tefk","text":"Determine the DNA concentration by measuring 1 µL on the Nanodrop.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9uptl","text":"This is the insert library for the subsequent Gibson assembly. Freeze at -20°C until use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5efum","text":"To obtain more backbone, multiple reactions can be set up in parallel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"mais","text":"Set up the following PCR reaction:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"90rla","text":"1 ng pMPRA1 (addgene #49349)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a9d9n","text":"2.5 µL pMPRA1_BB_F (10µM stock)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"al5uf","text":"2.5 µL pMPRA1_BB_R (10µM stock)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6fct2","text":"25 µL Q5 Hot Start High-Fidelity 2X Master Mix","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ahcmo","text":"to 50 µL: nuclease free water","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d97th","text":"Incubate in a PCR cycler with heated  lid:","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4uf5s","text":"30s - 98°C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ana68","text":"35 cycles (10s - 98°C; 20s - 68°C; 1min - 72°C)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"15p13","text":"5min - 72°C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ff6u0","text":"hold - 4°C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"15v6o","text":"Determine DNA concentration by measuring 1 µL on the Nanodrop.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e5svq","text":"This is the backbone for the subsequent Gibson assembly. Freeze at -20°C until use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cu3m7","text":"Set up a Gibson assembly reaction in a PCR tube:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dg29h","text":"1 µg backbone from step   ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"475d","text":"2:1 molar ratio (~ 320 ng) insert from step   ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":44,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6if17","text":"to 50 µL: nuclease free water","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cv6lo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"BB26C690FC3C11EBA4D55F21EF5915FB","id":0,"step_guid":"C50D7120FC3911EBA4D55F21EF5915FB","title":""}},"1":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"F5DD2400FC3C11EBA4D55F21EF5915FB","id":0,"step_guid":"CFBD1B90FC3711EBA4D55F21EF5915FB","title":""}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"blht5","text":"Add 50 µL NEBuilder HiFi DNA Assembly Master Mix, mix briefly by pipetting up and down and immediately transfer reaction to the PCR cycler at 50°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ep6tk","text":"Incubate for 1h at 50°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"k95u","text":"Preheat a PCR cycler to 50°C, with lid temperature ≥ 75°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8hmj2","text":"Purify the product using the DNA Clean \u0026 Concentrator Kit (binding buffer ratio 2:1) and following the manufacturer's protocol. Elute in 9 µL nuclease free water. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1hdah","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1vfq2","text":"Perform DNA gel electrophoresis and DNA gel extraction (band at 2499bp) as described in steps   -   . Elute in 20 µL nuclease free water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":94,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":98,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"269es","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"9F9A25E1FE7411EB878B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"step_guid":"36195C30FC3511EBA4D55F21EF5915FB","title":""}},"1":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"AFBCCEA0FE7411EBA4D55F21EF5915FB","id":0,"step_guid":"65A2BE50FC3611EBA4D55F21EF5915FB","title":""}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cesd2","text":"Determine DNA concentration by measuring 1 µL on the Nanodrop.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3dg4e","text":"Ideally, continue with electrotransformation straight away.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a99k8","text":"Prewarm 1 mL SOC medium, ideally to 37°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9apf2","text":"Keep a 1.5 mL Eppendorf tube warm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a2gl4","text":"Thaw a vial (100 µL) of ElectroMAX Stbl4 Competent Cells on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bo9u1","text":"Precool four electroporation cuvettes on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"45i7j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"50blo","text":"Set electroporator to the following parameters:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fpqe","text":"1.8 kV","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"24bl9","text":"25 μF","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"65ili","text":"200 Ω","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eeh2q","text":"Mix bacteria with 400 ng of purified Gibson assembly product from step   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":71,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3a86n","text":"Distribute bacteria to the 4 cuvettes (25 µL each), while keeping them on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fafh9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"16BF0A10FC3F11EBA4D55F21EF5915FB","id":0,"step_guid":"1538FBC0FC3E11EBA4D55F21EF5915FB","title":""}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"34rlb","text":"Electroporate each cuvette with parameters set in step    and immediately add 200 µL warm SOC medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":55,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cim98","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"62097BE0FC3F11EBA4D55F21EF5915FB","id":0,"step_guid":"F6A19A90FC3E11EBA4D55F21EF5915FB","title":""}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5dc6v","text":"Combine the 4 reactions in the 1.5 mL Eppendorf tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eei4a","text":"Shake the electrotransformed bacteria for 30min at 37°C and 200 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2alib","text":"In the meantime, prewarm 24 LB-agar plates (10 cm diameter) with 100 µg/mL Carbenicillin to 37°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fp43f","text":"Vortex bacteria thoroughly and prepare the following 2 conditions:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"84lcm","text":"condition A: 700 µL bacteria + 800 µL warm LB medium","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"64vhj","text":"condition B:  70 µL bacteria + 1430 µL warm LB medium","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4rhun","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"em5bj","text":"From both conditions, prepare dilutions for counting plates:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":5,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bhuh2","text":"1:1K dilution (7 µL bacteria + 693 µL warm LB medium)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7fm1p","text":"1:10K dilution (70 µL bacteria [1:1K dilution] + 630 µL warm LB medium)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"et3p2","text":"When plating 140 µL, the counting plate has 1'000 times / 10'000 times less colonies than all 10 plates of a certain condition combined.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9647f","text":"For each condition:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"agmp8","text":"Plate 140 µL for both counting plates","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ar4k","text":"Plate 140 µL bacteria mix from step   on 10 plates.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c97id","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"3F6AD100FC4511EBA4D55F21EF5915FB","id":0,"step_guid":"7763CE10FC4311EBA4D55F21EF5915FB","title":""}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cb78e","text":"Label all plates and incubate them at 37°C overnight (min. 16h).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"p374","text":"Depending on the number of CREs in the pool, and the desired number of barcodes per CRE; calculate the required colony number using the following formula: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"btjh1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6lqhi","text":"required colony number = (number of CREs) * (desired number of barcodes per CRE)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7l4kh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a1c1n","text":"Based on the required colony number, choose a condition (undiluted or 1:10 diluted) and scrape the respective number of colonies using cell scrapers and LB medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"btdfh","text":"Count colonies on counting plates and calculate the number of transformants for each condition. If there is too many colonies, count a quarter of the plate and multiply the count by 4.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d18nm","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eemad","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1db65","text":"Don't trash the counting plates yet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6i43c","text":"e.g. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6aq4r","text":"560 colonies on 1:10'000 dilution \u0026 5200 colonies on 1:1'000 dilution ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"vu4c","text":"=\u003e ~ 5.4mio. colonies distributed on 10 plates of this condition","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2g927","text":"Combine the scraped colonies in one tube and vortex to resuspend. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4dt7l","text":"Extract plasmid DNA using the QIAprep Spin Miniprep Kit and following the manufacturer's protocol. Depending on the amount of bacteria, split the mixture into multiple reactions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1v1ge","text":"Determine DNA concentration by measuring 1 µL on the Nanodrop.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"69h4p","text":"Plasmid DNA can be stored at -20°C for months.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"55rbu","text":"This is the MPRA pre-pool which will be used for:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6s8lt","text":"CRE-Barcode-association sequencing","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e2rp4","text":"Subsequent cloning: insertion of minimal promoter and reporter gene","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8j8ua","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7hnom","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"57ja4","text":"To verify the correct identity of the MPRA pre-pool, perform analytical restriction digest with 250 ng of the MPRA pre-pool. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"311qn","text":"Set up two separate reactions, following the manufacturer's protocol:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6cvje","text":"Linearization with KpnI","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f8ckg","text":"Cut out CRE insert with KpnI and SpeI","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c6sg0","text":"Perform DNA gel electrophoresis as described in step   . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":53,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7oddr","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9hqqs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"901ED166FE7411EB878B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"step_guid":"36195C30FC3511EBA4D55F21EF5915FB","title":""}},"1":{"type":"result","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"45m97","text":"Linearization: band at ~2850bp","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"evf0s","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"di7ga","text":"Backbone: band at ~2300bp; Insert: band at 534bp","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"42nr8","text":"In this section, the minimal promoter and reporter gene (mScarlet-I) are added to the MPRA pre-pool via restriction cloning.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d4tih","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"68ccs","text":"The plasmid pGR029 (note: also pGR023 and pGR025 - pGR033) contains ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d7fij","text":"the minimal Promoter (derived from pNL3.1[Nluc/minP], Promega) and ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9vojl","text":"mScarlet-I (kind gift from the Goetz Lab)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"43uem","text":"flanked by KpnI and EcoRI restriction sites.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ef0l9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3lnvi","text":"Both pGR029 and the MPRA pre-pool are digested with EcoRI and KpnI. For each reaction, use 5 µg input DNA and 2.5 µL of both enzymes in 50 µL reactions, shaking for 2h at 37°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3qofm","text":"Perform DNA gel electrophoresis on the pGR029 digest as described in step   , and cut the relevant band at 779bp.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":74,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"s725","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2gl7s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ci17a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"BCDFAEAAFE7411EB878B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"step_guid":"36195C30FC3511EBA4D55F21EF5915FB","title":""}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"62pi0","text":"The MPRA pre-pool does not need to run on the gel, since the 'insert' is just 4 bp long and can be removed by a simple cleanup with the DNA Clean \u0026 Concentrator Kit.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2edqr","text":"Extract DNA from the agarose by using the Zymoclean Gel DNA Recovery Kit and following the manufacturer's protocol. Elute in 20 µL nuclease free water. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ufjd","text":"Repurify the gel-extracted product using the DNA Clean \u0026 Concentrator Kit (binding buffer ratio 5:1) and following the manufacturer's protocol. Elute in 12 µL nuclease free water. This is the insert for the subsequent ligation reaction.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ve7j","text":"Purify the restriction digest of the MPRA pre-pool using the DNA Clean \u0026 Concentrator Kit, and elute in 12 µL nuclease free water. This is the backbone for the subsequent ligation reaction.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4vqdm","text":"Determine the DNA concentrations by measuring 1 µL on the Nanodrop.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3vck9","text":"Freeze at -20°C until use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"77e4r","text":"Set up the following ligation reaction:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"53qf8","text":"2 µg backbone (digested MPRA pre-pool)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6t29r","text":"2:1 molar ratio of insert (MP_mScarlet-I) =\u003e ~ 550 ng","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c8sjq","text":"to 175 µL: nuclease free water","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1nsed","text":"20 µL T4 DNA ligase buffer (10X)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"93j5k","text":"5 µL T4 DNA ligase","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4ctko","text":"To verify the correct identity of individual clones, pick 16 colonies from a counting plate and inoculate overnight cultures (2 mL LB medium with 100 µg/mL Carbenicillin, shaking at 37°C overnight).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7iuup","text":"Extract plasmid DNA from individual clones using the QIAprep Spin Miniprep Kit and send plasmids for Sanger sequencing using the following primers: RVprimer3(pMPRA1)_F and EBV-rev(pMPRA1)_R","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9hpam","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c9573","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"result","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":78}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"77t61","text":"Expected Sanger results, polyN represent the 12bp barcode, introduced in step   ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fu80b","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":20,"offset":0,"style":"italic"},{"length":20,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"6nk5l","text":"RVprimer3(pMPRA1)_F:","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":20,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"bijjj","text":"CTAGCAAAATAGGCTGTCCCCAGTGCAAGTGCAGGTGCCAGAACATTTCTCTGGCCTAACTGGCCAGGACCGGATCAACT***CRE_270bp***CATTGCGTGAACCGAGGTACCAGATGAATTCNNNNNNNNNNNNCAGATCGGAAGAGCGTCGGCCTCGGCGGCCAAGCTAGTCGGGGCGGCCGGCCGCTTCGAGCAGACATGATAAGATACATTGATGAGTTTGGACAAACCAC","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"jvic","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":18,"offset":0,"style":"italic"},{"length":18,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"6rq79","text":"EBV-rev(pMPRA1)_R:","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":20,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"dboqb","text":"GTGGTTTGTCCAAACTCATCAATGTATCTTATCATGTCTGCTCGAAGCGGCCGGCCGCCCCGACTAGCTTGGCCGCCGAGGCCGACGCTCTTCCGATCTGNNNNNNNNNNNNGAATTCATCTGGTACCTCGGTTCACGCAATG***CRE_270bp_revcomp***AGTTGATCCGGTCCTGGCCAGTTAGGCCAGAGAAATGTTCTGGCACCTGCACTTGCACTGGGGACAGCCTATTTTGCTAG","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"guid":"7777C7E0FE8B11EB82DB1396CABB663E","id":0,"step_guid":"19523910FC3411EBA4D55F21EF5915FB","title":""},"mutability":"","type":"gotostep"}}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"da608","text":"Incubate in this order: 30min at 4°C, 4h at 16°C and 30min at RT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"36rjr","text":"Purify the ligation product using the DNA Clean \u0026 Concentrator Kit (binding buffer ratio 2:1) and following the manufacturer's protocol. Elute in 9 µL nuclease free water. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ak145","text":"Determine DNA concentration by measuring 1 µL on the Nanodrop.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5j2uv","text":"Perform electrotransformation of 100 µL electrocompetent bacteria with 400 ng of purified ligation product as described in   -   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":123,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":127,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"77qcg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"F292EEC0FE7011EBA4D55F21EF5915FB","id":0,"step_guid":"B626F370FC3E11EBA4D55F21EF5915FB","title":""}},"1":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"F30ADDE0FE7011EBA4D55F21EF5915FB","id":0,"step_guid":"8DC1F550FC3F11EBA4D55F21EF5915FB","title":""}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ddcr","text":"In the meantime, prewarm 3 normal LB-agar plates (10 cm diameter) and 10 big LB-agar plates (15 cm diameter) with 100 µg/mL Carbenicillin to 37°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e42r3","text":"Fill the bacterial culture up to 4 mL with LB medium. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7h9lu","text":"Prepare dilutions for counting plates:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6jgnn","text":"1:1K:   5 µL bacterial culture + 195 µL LB medium","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"k3di","text":"1:10K:   20 µL (1:1K dil.) + 180 µL LB medium","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cauvp","text":"1:100K:   20 µL (1:10K dil.) + 180 µL LB medium","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"hiht","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ffs0r","text":"Plate 140 µL from each counting plate dilution on LB-agar plates (10 cm diameter).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"152d9","text":"Plate 350 µL of the bacterial culture from step    on each of the 10 big LB-agar plates (15 cm diameter).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":48,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dkm05","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"A53876C0FE7211EBA4D55F21EF5915FB","id":0,"step_guid":"5B4D1530FE7111EBA4D55F21EF5915FB","title":""}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7oo34","text":"Label all plates and incubate them at 37°C overnight (20h).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e4k7n","text":"Count colonies on counting plates and calculate the number of transformants. If there is too many colonies, count a quarter of the plate and multiply the count by 4.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1fkd9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e3a22","text":"To preserve library complexity, the number of transformants should exceed the desired library complexity from step   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":115,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"65omd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"FD490500FE7211EBA4D55F21EF5915FB","id":0,"step_guid":"AF89D1C0FC4511EBA4D55F21EF5915FB","title":""}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fnh96","text":"Scrape all colonies from the 10 big LB-agar plates using cell scrapers and LB medium. Combine the bacteria and vortex thoroughly to resuspend.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dncmq","text":"Extract plasmid DNA using the EndoFree Plasmid Maxi Kit and following the manufacturer's protocol. In the final step, resuspend the DNA pellet in 1X sterile PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"484dc","text":"Determine DNA concentration by measuring 1 µL on the Nanodrop.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"61fkq","text":"This is the final MPRA pool. Freeze in aliquots (!) at -20°C. Repeated freeze-thaw cycles are not recommended!","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"euo16","text":"To verify the correct identity of the MPRA pool, perform analytical restriction digest with 250 ng of the MPRA pool. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7vph5","text":"Set up two separate reactions, following the manufacturer's protocol:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"duoh8","text":"Linearization with BamHI","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ckcmk","text":"BamHI and KpnI","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3qnvl","text":"Perform DNA gel electrophoresis as described in step   . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":53,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"djn0k","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fkrj9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bmg57","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"864BD430FE7411EBA4D55F21EF5915FB","id":0,"step_guid":"36195C30FC3511EBA4D55F21EF5915FB","title":""}},"1":{"type":"result","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"b8s2r","text":"Linearization: band at ~3.6kbp","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8j16b","text":"BamHI + KpnI: bands at ~2.5kbp and ~1.1kbp","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ata7k","text":"Resuspend the single stranded oligos in nuclease free water to obtain a concentration of 20 ng/µL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: MPRA plasmid pool preparation
